name: Elaria: The Corrupted Throne
description:
ARISE!

Spilling from your tomb without your memory, you venture forth into an epic fantasy RPG world. Uncover the reason for your undeath and save the lands of Elaria from a new foe that threatens the very fabric of reality.

LOOT

Seek out powerful enemies in winding, repeatable dungeons to level up and equip yourself for any danger. Discover powerful armor set bonuses, or mix and match for unique results! Equip two weapons at once to use both sets of abilities. Crush your enemies with devastating status effect combos.

ADOH

Adoh is Elaria's premier card battling and collection game! Battle against any other non-hostile NPC in the game and take their cards. Spin cards and use regional rules to make combo plays!

FEATURES

Singleplayer ARPG gameplay with traditional RPG mechanics!
Take on the main questline or wander the open world and tackle dozens of side missions
Hundreds of weapons and armors to customize your character
Over 90 unique abilities to play however you want
Collect 100 cards to become an Adoh master
Dive into a dozen unique dungeons to gather loot and take on powerful bosses
New Game Plus!
